document.discussion_title: Monday weather forecast: Hot weather prevails in general
document.topic_text: Monday weather forecast: Hot weather prevails in general SANA Monday 22nd August, 2016 The Meteorology Department said in its Monday bulletin that the weather remains hot and skies will be clear to partly cloudy in general, as the weather will be misty and very hot in the eastern, al- Jazira and al-Badiya (desert). The winds are northwesterly of low to moderate speed, while the sea waves will be of low amplitude. The expected temperatures in some main Syrian cities are as follows: Damascus 39/22, Daraa 37/21, Hama 40/23, Homs 35/22, Lattakia 33/24, Aleppo 39/23 and Deir Ezzor 43/28. Reem/ Ghossoun

The winds are northwesterly of low to moderate speed, while the sea waves will be of low amplitude. The expected temperatures in some main Syrian cities are as follows: Damascus 39/22, Daraa 37/21, Hama 40/23, Homs 35/22, Lattakia 33/24, Aleppo 39/23 and Deir Ezzor 43/28. Reem/ Ghossoun
